title: Arndt You Ready? Here we go again.
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Arndt You Ready? Here we go again.
posts.post_content:
Ten exceptional T206 cards are listed at this time.  Offers considered but asking prices only will be honored in the first 48 hours.  Offers may be made early and will be considered in order received.  Shipping included in pricing.  PayPal F & F is accepted for cards in this lot, as well as other forms of net payment.  Thanks for looking.

Harry Arndt P350 SGC 5.5 - Only $250

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/44234/arndt[/IMG]
